items.title: Success’s Secret Weapon: The Art of External Inspiration
items.description: Use others’ words to show yourself and your team what can be accomplished.

items.title: The Next Corporate Risk No One Is Preparing For
items.description: Executives are protecting networks, finances, and infrastructure, but not the personal data behind it.

items.title: Design a Workflow That Follows the Work
items.description: How a modern creative team uses environment, acoustics, and structure to protect deep, meaningful work.

items.title: How to Write so That AI Agents Actually Understand
items.description: AI will repeat whatever you teach it—a weakness your business can use to rank right away.

items.title: PayPal Takes the Lead in  ‘Anti-Bank’ Small Business Lending
items.description: After PayPal filed to create a new banking unit, digital loan platform Slope launched a new, JPMorgan-backed credit offer to Amazon vendors.
